amendment.description: Amendment designates $5 million for a survey on the NIST cybersecurity framework for reducing cyber risks to critical infrastructure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $5 million for a survey on the NIST cybersecurity framework for reducing cyber risks to critical infrastructure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Langevin.
